inlineContent.text: The Product Recognition SDK lets you build a fantastic in-store experience in your iOS app. The framework provides a camera interface through
for product detection. You can also manually scan images and use

abstract.text: Effortlessly scan products in the grocery store and get all needed data about them.

A configuration that describes the scan again button and container.
ProductRecognition can be installed via CocoaPods, Carthage, or Swift Package Manager. You can also manually add the framework to your project.
